  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void init()
    in this method we create any objects that we need in the beginning of the game
    void playSound()
    the zombies are coming !!!
    void setGameCards​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardNames)
    set the game cards this method get a list of card names and make new cards
    void update()
    check whether a step is completed or not we have five step the first step is for planting and achieve suns( the duration is 5 sec) the second part is first coming of zombies( the duration is 2.5 min and in each 30 sec one zombie is coming) the second part is second coming of zombies( the duration is 3 min and in each 30 sec two zombie are coming) the second part is third coming(Huge wave) of zombies( the duration is 2.5 min and in each 25 sec two zombie are coming)
    void zombieMaker()
    this is zombie maker method it creat random zombie and add it to the elements list in game state

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • init

      public void init()
      in this method we create any objects that we need in the beginning of the game

    • setGameCards

      public void setGameCards​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cardNames)
      set the game cards this method get a list of card names and make new cards
      Parameters:
      cardNames - the name of cards

    • update

      public void update()
      check whether a step is completed or not we have five step the first step is for planting and achieve suns( the duration is 5 sec) the second part is first coming of zombies( the duration is 2.5 min and in each 30 sec one zombie is coming) the second part is second coming of zombies( the duration is 3 min and in each 30 sec two zombie are coming) the second part is third coming(Huge wave) of zombies( the duration is 2.5 min and in each 25 sec two zombie are coming)

    • zombieMaker

      public void zombieMaker()
      this is zombie maker method it creat random zombie and add it to the elements list in game state

    • playSound

      public void playSound()
      the zombies are coming !!!
